# Ahooling Flight
## Overview
You have trained hard and may now take flight with your vestigial wings, just like your vampiric brethren.

## Requirements and Restrictions
**Prerequisite**: *Ahooling Wings, 8th level*

## Effects
You gain the following benefits:

- You gain flying speed equal to your base speed.
- If you already have a flying speed from the flight of the vampire ability, your flying speed increases to 60 ft.
